div.pre: 669 Tr√¢stenik, c. 25 km. NW of Pleven, Bulgaria, 1959 Burial: after 45 B.C. (T) Contents: 65+ AR. Pot hoard Dyrrhachium: 2 dr. Roman Rep.: many den. (to c. 45 B.C., Syd. 982-5) Disposition: Pleven 2 Dyrrhachium, 63 den. Gerasimov, BIAB 25 (1962), p. 232
